Length of the intervention/session. In terms of miniutes, format: 00:00

intervention span (days/weeks/months) — over what time period did the intervention take place? E.g. for two sessions of a discussion group on consecutive days, intervention_span=2 days

Synergy (0 = no, 1 = yes) — the idea that two (or more) theory-inspired
interventions work especially well when delivered in tandem (see sidebar)

Personalization (0= no, 1 = yes) — customizing interventions according to the
particular characteristics of the participants and the context they inhabit (see
appendix)
